titles.title: A bill to permanently increase the maximum annual contribution allowed to be made to Coverdell education savings accounts.
Education Savings for Students Act of 2007
Education Savings for Students Act of 2007

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Education Savings for Students Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the maximum annual contribution limit for Coverdell education savings accounts from $2,000 to $5,000 and make such increase permanent.
